snippet.title: Valfaris: Mecha Therion - Official Trailer | Realms Deep 2023
snippet.description: See formidable enemies and action-packed gameplay in this trailer for Valfaris: Mecha Therion, the upcoming 2.5D side-scrolling shoot ‘em-up game and sequel to Valfaris. Therion returns as the hunt for Lord Vroll continues. Pilot an advanced machine of death and destruction, strap in, and unleash mecha hell. Valfaris: Mecha Therion will be available on PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, PC, Nintendo Switch, Xbox Series X/S, and Xbox One.
